live_updates: BC Hydro is on site making repairs. Once Hydro services have been restored, we expect Shaw services to come back online. Full list of BC Hydro outages can be found at https://www.bchydro.com/power-outages/app/outage-list.html

This interruption is related to a power outage in the area. Our technicians will be working to restore service as soon as power has been restored. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates as they become available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
36301.summary: Some customers in the Victoria-Fraserview area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

live_updates: Services have been restored in the area. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 9:00pm. Please stay tuned for updates.
